channel.title: Trips on Albert Azemars' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Trips on Albert Azemars' Blog

item.title: Planes Busses and Opera
item.description: Planes, busses, and opera Well, I’ve just landed at Bilbao Airport. I’m having a bit of a headache, probably caused by sleep deprivation or caffeine withdrawal. So ordering a double expresso seemed to be the obvious solution. Little did I know that I would be greeted with an overpriced coffee soup worthy to be served at Central Perk. To reach my final destination, Zarautz, I’m taking a bus that leaves in 30 minutes.
